meanings.sent1: The barkiest dog in the park was very loud.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the dogs, he was the barkiest.
meanings.sent3: The barkiest pup in the litter was always the first to alert everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the barkiest in the choir, carrying through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The barkiest tree in the forest could be heard from miles away.

meanings.sent1: His dog's barkiest was so loud that it woke up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The barkiest of all the dogs belonged to the old man down the street.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy's barkiest was surprisingly deep for its size.
meanings.sent4: The barkiest of the pack could be heard echoing through the valley.
meanings.sent5: In the competition, her barkiest stood out as the most powerful and commanding.
